detectors.description:
Reentrancy in ShuffleToken.init(address,uint256) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#613-636):
	External calls:
	- _setBalance(_to,_amount) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#634)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ShuffleToken.totalSupply (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#590) in totalSupply = _amount (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#635)

detectors.description: Heap.update(address,uint256) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#523-562) ignores return value by heap.popTop() (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#545)

Reentrancy in ShuffleToken._transferFrom(address,address,address,uint256,bool) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#698-764):
	External calls:
	- balanceFrom = _balanceOf(_from) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#707)
	- allowanceFrom = _allowance(_from,_operator) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#713)
	- _setAllowance(_from,_operator,allowanceFrom.sub(_value)) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#718)
	- _setBalance(_from,balanceFrom.sub(_value)) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#729)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ShuffleToken.totalSupply (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#590) in totalSupply = totalSupply.sub(burn) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#745)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in ShuffleToken._transferFrom(address,address,address,uint256,bool) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#698-764):
	External calls:
	- balanceFrom = _balanceOf(_from) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#707)
	- allowanceFrom = _allowance(_from,_operator) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#713)
	- _setAllowance(_from,_operator,allowanceFrom.sub(_value)) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#718)
	- _setBalance(_from,balanceFrom.sub(_value)) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#729)
	- winner = _pickWinner(_from,_value) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#750)
	- _setBalance(winner,_balanceOf(winner).add(shuf)) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#752)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Winner(winner,shuf) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#753)
	- Transfer(_from,winner,shuf) (ShuffleToken_5470.sol#754)
